ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] "Assist" hot key
ygData.msgSnippet: definitely true.  It only works at about the range of Denon s or so. Kit That s how you do it.. /assist  BUT, you have to be in fairly close proximity,
ygData.messageBody:
definitely true. It only works at about the range of Denon's or so.

Kit

That's how you do it.. /assist <name> BUT, you have to be in fairly close
proximity, and mine won't work if I'm staring at my spell book and hit the

Halana, 52nd Shaman
Tani, 23rd Bard
Solusek Ro
